column2: The percentage of Thai students with scientific proficiency at each level of the Programme for International Student Assessment (PISA), categorized by school groups, from PISA 2006 to PISA 2022.

column3: "Opportunity expansion schools" under the Office of the Basic Education Commission (OBEC).
Schools offering secondary education under the Office of the Basic Education Commission (OBEC).
Schools under the Office of the Private Education Commission (OPEC).
Schools under the Bangkok Metropolitan Administration (BMA) Education Office.
Schools under the Department of Local Administration, Ministry of Interior.
Demonstration schools of universities under the Ministry of Higher Education, Science, Research, and Innovation.
Vocational schools under the Office of the Private Education Commission (OPEC).
Educational institutions under the Office of the Vocational Education Commission (OVEC).
Schools specializing in science and mathematics education.
In PISA 2018 and PISA 2022, the educational institutions under the Office of the Vocational Education Commission included both public and private institutions.
